attributes.action: introduce a law that all prospective candidates for election to the House of Commons as an MP should have had their main employment outside of politics (ie not working full time for a political party, MP's researcher, local government, trade unions etc) for a minimum of 5 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country is being ruined by a political class that has never held employment outside of the political sphere and as a result has no idea of basic concepts from the real world such as basic management and accountability. A way to end this is to require all MPs to have experience of a real job so they understand the real world and how the rest of us live...
